contest-event.event-date: Feb. 13, 1971 D Durham League Contest (Section B) Durham League Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-b The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Les Preludes [arr. Rimmer] Welfare Hall, Easington Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 4 bands competed. April 19, 2013, 9:38 a.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 10:48 a.m. 1 Pelton Fell Workmen's Cliff Sayers 2 Shotton Colliery Band W. H. Gelson 3 Sunderland Youth Earnest Camsey 4 Pride Valley Brass A.
